item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $121,000
item.description: On August 13th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin saw a rebound and managed to break through $121,000, registering a 24-hour gain of 2.42%.

item.title: Pendle TVL Surpasses $9 Billion, Hits All-Time High
item.description: On August 13th, Pendle TVL exceeded $9 billion and reached a brand new all-time high. Among this total, $6.4 billion is in PTs.Yesterday, Aave raised the limit of PT-USDe (September 2025) by $600 million, and this entire increase was completely utilized. As a consequence, Pendle's TVL using PT as collateral rocketed to a brand new all-time high of $4.6 billion.

item.title: Sharplink LSETH Position Unrealized PnL has reached $323 million
item.description: On August 13th, as reported by Cointelegraph, it was disclosed that the unrealized profit and loss of the LSETH held by Sharplink Gaming amounts to $323 million.BlockBeats Note: LSETH is a kind of Liquid Staking Derivative (LSD), representing a liquidity voucher obtained by staking Ethereum (ETH). Its core function is to enable users to continuously earn ETH staking rewards while maintaining the liquidity of assets. They can further participate in yield stacking or trading through DeFi protocols.

item.title: A whale who accumulated Ethereum last November has now taken profit on the entire position, making over $7.5 million.
item.description: On August 13th, according to the monitoring of @EmberCN, Whale 0xe42...08A was noticed to have accumulated 6,918 ETH when the price was $3,613 on November 30 of last year. After holding for 9 months, one hour ago, it began to split in three transactions and transferred all the tokens to Binance, finally achieving a profit of $7.52 million.

item.title: US Stock Market's Three Major Indexes Open Higher, Cryptocurrency-related Stocks Experience Broad Gains
item.description: On August 13th, based on Rockflow market data, at the opening of the U.S. stock market, the Dow increased by 0.4%, the S&P 500 rose by 0.3%, and the Nasdaq Composite went up by 0.38%. U.S. stock market cryptocurrency concept stocks witnessed a general rise, including:· Sharplink Gaming rose by 4.52%;· Bitmine rose by 10.27%;· Strategy rose by 0.61%;· Coinbase rose by 3.01%;· HOOD rose by 0.90%;· BTCS rose by 1.98%.

item.title: North Korean Hackers Attempt to Apply to Binance Daily, Forge Large Number of Resumes
item.description: On August 13th, Binance's Chief Security Officer Jimmy Su stated that the exchange receives a significant number of forged resumes on a daily basis, and he is confident that these resumes are all written by potential North Korean attackers. In his opinion, state-level attackers from North Korea pose the greatest threat faced by companies in the crypto industry at present. Su explained that North Korean attackers have been a problem throughout Binance's eight-year operating history, but recently, their attack methods have been upgraded in the crypto field."Currently, the greatest threat to the crypto industry is state-level attackers, especially North Korea's Lazarus Group," Su added. "In the past two to three years, they have focused on the crypto field and have been quite successful in their actions." He also mentioned, "Almost all major North Korean hacker incidents involve someone posing as an employee to assist in the attack."North Korean state-level attackers have two common a

item.title: AguilaTrades is shorting Ethereum, shorting 5000 ETH with 15x leverage
item.description: Update: On August 13th, based on monitoring, the ETH long and BTC short positions of the contract whale trader AguilaTrades this morning only endured for 2 hours. It exited with a profit of $250,000. Subsequently, a shift to an ETH long position led to a loss of $107,000 before being stopped out.Currently, AguilaTrades has opened a 15x leverage ETH short position, entering at $4,684.59 for 5,000 ETH. A limit sell order of 10,000 ETH is still pending in the [4740 - 4840] range.

item.title: A whale has decided to take some profits from their Ethereum accumulation in November last year, depositing a total of 5001 ETH into a CEX.
item.description: On August 13th, based on EmberCN's monitoring, Whale 0xe42...08A accumulated 6918 ETH at a price of $3,613 on November 30 of the previous year. After holding for 9 months, just half an hour ago, the whale partially realized profits by depositing a total of 5001 ETH into Binance (approximately $23.49 million).

item.title: Sign Foundation Completes $12 Million SIGN Token Buyback
item.description: On August 13th, the Sign Foundation has accomplished a $12 million buyback of SIGN tokens:- $8 million was purchased through the open market, and 117 million SIGN was obtained;- $4 million was settled through private negotiations.The repurchased tokens will be utilized to: support partnerships with publicly listed companies, support new exchange listings, and expand the Orange Dynasty project.

item.title: In the last 24 hours, CEX net inflow was 138.91 BTC
item.description: August 13th. According to Coinglass data, during the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of BTC on CEX was 138.91 BTC. The top three CEX exchanges in terms of inflow volume are as follows:- Binance: A net inflow of 820.58 BTC.- Bitstamp: A net inflow of 574.31 BTC.- Coinbase Pro: A net inflow of 453.80 BTC.In addition, Bitfinex had a net outflow of 710.24 BTC, ranking first in the outflow list.
